document_data.name: Dakawa
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dakawa''' was a tribe of the [[Bedine]] people that lived in the sands of the [[Anauroch]] desert.
document_data.History: During a great drought the Dakawa ventured to the oasis at the bases of [[El Rahalat]] mountain. There they encountered its namesake resident, the exiled [[sorceress]] [[Rahalat]] and slew her in order to claim the land as their own.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Bedine legend stated the springs of the oasis turned to blood for a decade after Rahalat's death. Thereafter, any tribe staying at El Rahalat sacrificed a [[camel]] to Rahalat in order to keep the water pure.
